import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var counterSlice=createSlice({name:'modal',initialState:{value:false},reducers:{setModal:function setModal(state){state.value=!state.value;}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var setModal=counterSlice.actions.setModal;export{setModal};export default counterSlice.reducer;
